title: Empowering Women and Youth for Productive and Sustainable Empowerment - Debre Birhan
details: The vocational skills training on Food Preparation, Basic Computer Training and Women Beauty Salon were implemented since 2010. The food Preparation training is interrupted since 2014 due to insufficient number of trainees as well as sufficient fund. To date KCCBSSA has graduated 719 (253 male and 466 female) in Basic Computer training and 535 (47 male and 488 female) in Women Beauty salon.
